original_title: White Wolves III - Cry of the White Wolf
overview: Two teenagers are put to the test when the plane taking them to a wilderness boot camp for juvenile offenders crashes into the vast sierra. Their pilot, Quentin, injured and ununable to make the dangerous journey, teaches them the ways of his ancient people and to have faith in the spirit of the white wolf as well as themselves.
tagline: The spirit of an ancient hunter is now their only hope.
title: White Wolves III - Cry of the White Wolf
